lines.text: You see I really don't need this little sum of money, Månsson, it's not that. You see, it's about principle.

[drunk]
So old... why do you have to get so old... what are you doing here, idiot? What time is it?
I can't do it! I can't do it!
What is all this supposed to be good for?
What the hell, can't we have some fun?
I can't drive. But Sven can drive!

[to Sven]
Can you drive the car?
I didn't ask if you've got a license. I asked if you could drive the car!
They took it! They took my motorcycle!
